en-mt: As of April 5, Italy had 128,948 confirmed cases, 15,887 of deaths, and 21,815 recoveries, with the majority of cases occurring in the Lombardy region.

sourceString: A CNN report indicated that the combination of Italy's large elderly population and inability to test all who have the virus to date may be contributing to the high fatality rate.
targetString: CNN की एक रिपोर्ट ने संकेत दिया कि इटली की बड़ी बुजुर्ग आबादी और जिन लोगों में उस समय तक वायरस था उनका परीक्षण करने में असमर्थता के संयोजन ने उच्च मृत्यु दर में योगदान दिया हो सकता है।
en-mt: A CNN report indicated that a combination of Italy's large elderly population and the inability to test people who had the virus by that time may have contributed to the high mortality rate.

sourceString: The United Kingdom's response to the virus first emerged as one of the most relaxed of the affected countries, and until 18 March 2020, the British government did not impose any form of social distancing or mass quarantine measures on its citizens.
targetString: वायरस के लिए यूनाइटेड किंगडम की प्रतिक्रिया आरंभ में प्रभावित देशों में से सबसे शिथिल के रूप में उभरी, और 18 मार्च 2020 तक, ब्रिटिश सरकार ने अपने नागरिकों पर किसी भी प्रकार के सामाजिक दूरी बनाने के या बड़े पैमाने पर क्वारंटीन उपायों को लागू नहीं किया था।
en-mt: The United Kingdom's response to the virus initially emerged as the most lax of the affected countries, and as of 18 March 2020, the British government had not imposed any social distancing or mass quarantine measures on its citizens.

sourceString: As a result, the government received criticism for the perceived lack of pace and intensity in its response to concerns faced by the public.On 16 March, Prime Minister Boris Johnson made an announcement advising against all non-essential travel and social contact, suggesting people work from home where possible and avoid venues such as pubs, restaurants, and theatres.
targetString: परिणामस्वरूप, सरकार को जनता द्वारा सामना की जाने वाली चिंताओं के प्रति प्रतिक्रिया में गति और तीव्रता की कथित कमी के लिए आलोचना मिली। 16 मार्च को, प्रधान मंत्री बोरिस जॉनसन ने सभी गैर-जरूरी यात्रा और सामाजिक संपर्क को रोकने की सलाह दी, जिसमें लोगों को सुझाव दिया गया कि जहां संभव हो घर से काम करें और पब, रेस्तरां और थिएटर जैसे स्थानों से बचें।
en-mt: As a result, the government received criticism for its perceived lack of speed and intensity in response to concerns faced by the public. On March 16, Prime Minister Boris Johnson advised to stop all non-essential travel and social contact, suggesting people work from home where possible and avoid places such as pubs, restaurants and theatres.

sourceString: On 20 March, the government announced that all leisure establishments such as pubs and gyms were to close as soon as possible, and promised to pay up to 80% of workers' wages to a limit of £2,500 per month to prevent unemployment in the crisis.On 23 March, the Prime Minister announced tougher social distancing measures, banning gatherings of more than two people and restricting travel and outdoor activity to that deemed strictly necessary.
targetString: 20 मार्च को, सरकार ने घोषणा की कि सभी मनोरंजन प्रतिष्ठानों जैसे पब और जिम को जल्द से जल्द बंद करा जाए, और संकट में बेरोजगारी को रोकने के लिए प्रति माह £2,500 की सीमा तक श्रमिकों की वेतन के 80% तक का भुगतान करने का वादा किया। 23 मार्च को, प्रधान मंत्री ने सख्त सामाजिक दूरी बनाने के उपायों की घोषणा की, जिसमें दो से अधिक लोगों के एकत्र होने पर प्रतिबंध लगाया गया और यात्रा व बाहरी गतिविधि को अत्यावश्यक मानी जाने वाली गतिविधि तक सीमित किया।
en-mt: On 20 March, the government announced that all entertainment establishments such as pubs and gyms be closed as soon as possible, and promised to pay up to 80% of workers' salaries to a limit of £2,500 per month to prevent unemployment in crisis. On March 23, the prime minister announced strict social distancing measures, banning gatherings of more than two people and limiting travel and outdoor activity to activity considered essential.

sourceString: Unlike previous measures, these restrictions were enforceable by police through the issuing of fines and the dispersal of gatherings.
targetString: पिछले उपायों के विपरीत, ये प्रतिबंध पुलिस द्वारा जुर्माना लगाने और भीड़ के छितराव के माध्यम से लागू किए गए थे।
en-mt: Unlike previous measures, these restrictions were enforced by the police through imposition of fines and mob dispersion.

sourceString: Most businesses were ordered to close, with exceptions for businesses deemed "essential", including supermarkets, pharmacies, banks, hardware shops, petrol stations, and garages.
targetString: "आवश्यक" समझे जाने वाले व्यवसायों, जिनमें सुपरमार्केट, फार्मेसियाँ, बैंक, हार्डवेयर की दुकानें, पेट्रोल स्टेशन और गैरेज शामिल हैं, को छोड़कर अधिकांश व्यवसायों को बंद करने का आदेश दिया गया था।
en-mt: Most businesses were ordered to close except for those deemed "essential", including supermarkets, pharmacies, banks, hardware shops, petrol stations and garages.

sourceString: On 20 January, the first known case of COVID-19 was confirmed in the Pacific Northwest state of Washington in a man who had returned from Wuhan on 15 January.
targetString: 20 जनवरी को, वाशिंगटन के प्रशांतीय उत्तर-पश्चिमी राज्य में एक ऐसे व्यक्ति में COVID-19 के पहले ज्ञात मामले की पुष्टि हुई, जो 15 जनवरी को वुहान से लौटा था।
en-mt: On January 20, the first known case of COVID-19 was confirmed in the Pacific northwestern state of Washington in a man who returned from Wuhan on January 15.

sourceString: The White House Coronavirus Task Force was established on 29 January.
targetString: द व्हाइट हाउस कोरोनावायरस टास्क फोर्स की स्थापना 29 जनवरी को की गई थी।
en-mt: The White House Coronavirus Task Force was established on January 29.

sourceString: On 31 January, the Trump administration declared a public health emergency, and placed restrictions on entry for travellers from China.
targetString: 31 जनवरी को, ट्रम्प प्रशासन ने एक जन स्वास्थ्य आपातकाल की घोषणा की, और चीन से यात्रियों के प्रवेश पर प्रतिबंध लगा दिया।
en-mt: On January 31, the Trump administration declared a public health emergency, and banned the entry of travelers from China.

sourceString: On 28 January 2020, the Center for Disease Control—the leading public health institute of the U.S. government—announced they had developed their own testing kit.
targetString: 28 जनवरी 2020 को, रोग नियंत्रण केंद्र - अमेरिकी सरकार के प्रमुख जन स्वास्थ्य संस्थान - ने घोषणा की कि उन्होंने अपना परीक्षण किट विकसित किया है।
en-mt: On 28th January 2020, the Centers for Disease Control – the U.S. government's premier public health institution – announced that they had developed their own testing kit.

sourceString: Despite doing so, the United States had a slow start in testing, which obscured the true extent of the outbreak at the time.
targetString: ऐसा करने के बावजूद, अमेरिका ने परीक्षण में धीमी शुरुआत की, जिससे उस समय प्रकोप के वास्तविक विस्तार को समझने में कठिनाई हुई।
en-mt: Despite doing so, the U.S. made a slow start in testing, making it difficult to understand the true extent of the outbreak at the time.

sourceString: Testing was marred by defective test kits produced by the federal government in February, a lack of federal government approval for non-government test kits (by academia, companies and hospitals) until the end of February, and restrictive criteria for people to qualify for a test until early March (a doctor's order was required thereafter).
targetString: फरवरी में संघीय सरकार द्वारा निर्मित दोषपूर्ण परीक्षण किटों, फरवरी के अंत तक गैर-सरकारी परीक्षण किटों (शिक्षाविदों, कंपनियों और अस्पतालों द्वारा) के लिए संघीय सरकार के अनुमोदन का अभाव, और मार्च की शुरुआत तक लोगों के एक परीक्षण के लिए योग्य होने के लिए प्रतिबंधात्मक मानदंडों (उसके बाद एक चिकित्सक के आदेश की आवश्यकता थी) द्वारा परीक्षण बाधित हुआ।
en-mt: Testing was hampered by faulty testing kits manufactured by the federal government in February, the lack of federal government approval for non-governmental testing kits (by academics, companies, and hospitals) by the end of February, and restrictive criteria (requiring a physician's order thereafter) for people to be eligible for a test until early March.

sourceString: By 27 February, The Washington Post reported fewer than 4,000 tests had been conducted in the United States.
targetString: 27 फरवरी तक, द वाशिंगटन पोस्ट ने सूचित किया कि अमेरिका में 4,000 से कम परीक्षण किए गए थे।
en-mt: By February 27, The Washington Post reported that fewer than 4,000 tests had been conducted in the US.

sourceString: By 13 March, The Atlantic reported that less than 14,000 tests had been conducted.
targetString: 13 मार्च तक, द अटलांटिक ने सूचित किया कि 14,000 से कम परीक्षण किए गए थे।
en-mt: By March 13, The Atlantic reported that fewer than 14,000 tests had been conducted.

sourceString: On 22 March, the Associated Press reported: "Many people who have symptoms and a doctor's order have waited hours or days for a test."After the first death in the United States was reported in Washington state on 29 February, Governor Jay Inslee declared a state of emergency, an action that was soon followed by other states.
targetString: 22 मार्च को, द एसोसिएटेड प्रेस ने सूचित किया: "कई लोग जिनमें लक्षण हैं और उनके पास एक चिकित्सक का आदेश है, उन्होंने एक परीक्षण के लिए घंटों या दिनों तक इंतजार किया।" अमेरिका में 29 फरवरी को वाशिंगटन राज्य में पहली मृत्यु की सूचना के बाद गवर्नर जे इंसली ने आपातकालीन स्थिति की घोषणा की, एक कार्रवाई जिसका जल्द ही अन्य राज्यों द्वारा पालन किया गया।
en-mt: On March 22, The Associated Press reported: "Many people who have symptoms and have a physician's order waited for hours or days for a test. Governor Jay Inslee declared a state of emergency after the first death was reported in Washington state on February 29, an action that was soon followed by other states.

sourceString: Schools in the Seattle area cancelled classes on 3 March, and by mid-March, schools across the country were shutting down.On 6 March 2020, the United States was advised of projections for the impact of the new coronavirus on the country by a group of epidemiologists at Imperial College London.
targetString: सिएटल क्षेत्र के विद्यालयों ने 3 मार्च को कक्षाएं रद्द कर दीं और मार्च के मध्य तक, देश भर के विद्यालय बंद किए जा रहे थे। 6 मार्च 2020 को, इम्पीरियल कॉलेज लंदन में महामारी विज्ञान के विशेषज्ञों के एक समूह द्वारा अमेरिका को देश पर नए कोरोनावायरस के प्रभाव के अनुमानों के बारे में सलाह दी गई थी।
en-mt: Schools in the Seattle area canceled classes on March 3 and by mid-March, schools across the country were being closed. On 6th March 2020, the US was advised about projections of the impact of the new coronavirus on the country by a group of epidemiological experts at Imperial College London.

sourceString: On the same day President Trump signed the Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, which provided $8.3 billion in emergency funding for federal agencies to respond to the outbreak.
targetString: उसी दिन राष्ट्रपति ट्रम्प ने कोरोनावायरस तैयारी एवं प्रतिक्रिया अनुपूरक विनियोजन अधिनियम पर हस्ताक्षर किए, जिसने प्रकोप के प्रति प्रतिक्रिया हेतु संघीय एजेंसियों के लिए आपातकालीन वित्तपोषण में $8.3 अरब प्रदान किए।
en-mt: On the same day, President Trump signed the Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, which provided $8.3 billion in emergency financing for federal agencies to respond to the outbreak.

sourceString: Corporations imposed employee travel restrictions, cancelled conferences, and encouraged employees to work from home.
targetString: निगमों ने कर्मचारी यात्रा प्रतिबंध लगा दिए, सम्मेलनों को रद्द कर दिया और कर्मचारियों को घर से काम करने के लिए प्रोत्साहित किया।
en-mt: Corporations imposed employee travel restrictions, cancelled conferences and encouraged employees to work from home.

sourceString: Sports events and seasons were cancelled.On 11 March, Trump announced travel restrictions for most of Europe, excluding the United Kingdom, for 30 days, effective 13 March.
targetString: खेल स्पर्धाओं और सत्रों को रद्द कर दिया गया था। 11 मार्च को, 13 मार्च से प्रभावी, ट्रम्प ने यूनाइटेड किंगडम को छोड़कर अधिकांश यूरोप के लिए 30 दिनों तक यात्रा प्रतिबंधों की घोषणा की।
en-mt: Sports events and sessions were cancelled. On March 11, effective March 13, Trump announced travel restrictions for up to 30 days for most of Europe except the United Kingdom.

sourceString: The following day, he expanded the restrictions to include the United Kingdom and Ireland.
targetString: अगले दिन, उन्होंने प्रतिबंधों का विस्तार करके यूनाइटेड किंगडम और आयरलैंड को शामिल किया।
en-mt: The next day, he expanded the restrictions to include the United Kingdom and Ireland.

sourceString: On 13 March, he declared a national emergency, which made federal funds available to respond to the crisis.
targetString: 13 मार्च को, उन्होंने एक राष्ट्रीय आपातकाल की घोषणा की, जिसने संकट के प्रति प्रतिक्रिया के लिए संघीय धन उपलब्ध कराया।
en-mt: On March 13, he declared a national emergency, which made federal funding available to respond to the crisis.

sourceString: Beginning on 15 March, many businesses closed or reduced hours throughout the U.S. to try to reduce the spread of the virus.
targetString: 15 मार्च से शुरू होकर, कई व्यवसायों ने वायरस के प्रसार को कम करने की कोशिश करने के लिए पूरे अमेरिका में कार्य बंद किया या कार्य के समय को कम कर दिया।
en-mt: Starting on March 15, many businesses stopped functioning or reduced work hours across the US to try to reduce the spread of the virus.

sourceString: By 17 March, the epidemic had been confirmed in all 50 states and in the District of Columbia.On 23 March, it was reported that New York City had 10,700 cases of the coronavirus, more than the total number of cases in South Korea.
targetString: 17 मार्च तक, सभी 50 राज्यों और कोलंबिया जिले में महामारी की पुष्टि की गई थी। 23 मार्च को, यह सूचित किया गया था कि न्यूयॉर्क शहर में कोरोनावायरस के 10,700 मामले थे, जो दक्षिण कोरिया में कुल मामलों की तुलना में अधिक थे।
en-mt: By March 17, the pandemic had been confirmed in all 50 states and the District of Columbia. On March 23, it was reported that New York City had 10,700 cases of coronavirus, more than the total cases in South Korea.

sourceString: On 25 March, the governor said that social distancing seemed to be working, as estimates of case doubling slowed from 2.0 days to 4.7 days.
targetString: 25 मार्च को, गवर्नर ने कहा कि सामाजिक दूरी बनाना काम कर रहा था, क्योंकि मामले के दोगुने होने का अनुमान 2.0 दिनों से धीमा होकर 4.7 दिन हो गया।
en-mt: On March 25, the governor said social distancing was working, as the case doubling estimate slowed from 2.0 days to 4.7 days.

sourceString: As of 28 March, there were 32,308 confirmed cases in New York City, and 672 people had died from the virus.On 26 March, the United States was reported to have more confirmed coronavirus infection cases than any other country in the world, including China and Italy.As of 8 April, 400,335 cases have been confirmed in the United States, and 12,841 people have died.
targetString: 28 मार्च तक, न्यूयॉर्क शहर में 32,308 पुष्टि किए गए मामले थे, और 672 लोगों की वायरस से मृत्यु हो गई थी। 26 मार्च को, अमेरिका में चीन और इटली सहित विश्व के किसी भी अन्य देश की तुलना में अधिक पुष्टि किए कोरोनावायरस संक्रमण के मामलों की सूचना दी गई। 8 अप्रैल तक, अमेरिका में 400,335 मामलों की पुष्टि हुई है, और 12,841 लोगों की मृत्यु हो चुकी है।
en-mt: As of March 28, New York City had 32,308 confirmed cases, and 672 people had died from the virus. On March 26, the US reported more confirmed coronavirus infection cases than any other country in the world, including China and Italy. As of April 8, the US has 400,335 confirmed cases, and 12,841 deaths.

sourceString: Per media reports on 30 March, U.S. President Trump has decided to extend social distancing guidelines until 30 April.
targetString: मीडिया सूचनाओं के अनुसार 30 मार्च को अमेरिकी राष्ट्रपति ट्रम्प ने 30 अप्रैल तक सामाजिक दूरी बनाने के दिशानिर्देशों का विस्तार करने का निर्णय लिया।
en-mt: According to media reports, on March 30, US President Trump decided to extend the guidelines of social distance till April 30.

sourceString: On the same day, the USNS Comfort, a hospital ship with about 1000 beds, made anchor in New York.
targetString: उसी दिन, द USNS कम्फर्ट, एक अस्पताल जहाज जिसमें लगभग 1000 बेड थे, ने न्यूयॉर्क में लंगर डाला।
en-mt: On the same day, the USNS Comfort, a hospital ship with about 1000 beds, anchored in New York.

sourceString: On 3 April, the U.S. had a record 884 deaths due to the coronavirus in a 24-hour period.
targetString: 3 अप्रैल को, 24 घंटे की अवधि में कोरोनावायरस के कारण अमेरिका में रिकॉर्ड 884 मृत्यु हुईं।
en-mt: On April 3, there were a record 884 deaths in the US due to coronavirus in a 24-hour period.

sourceString: In the state of New York the cases have exceeded 100,000 people on 3 April.The White House has been criticized for downplaying the threat and controlling the messaging by directing health officials and scientists to coordinate public statements and publications related to the virus with the office of Vice-President Mike Pence.
targetString: न्यूयॉर्क राज्य में 3 अप्रैल को मामलों की संख्या 100,000 से अधिक हो गई। खतरे को कम आंकने और स्वास्थ्य अधिकारियों और वैज्ञानिकों को वायरस से संबंधित सार्वजनिक बयानों और प्रकाशनों को उपराष्ट्रपति माइक पेंस के कार्यालय के साथ समन्वय करने को निर्देशित करने द्वारा संदेशों को नियंत्रित करने के लिए व्हाइट हाउस की आलोचना की गई है।
en-mt: The number of cases in New York State exceeded 100,000 on April 3. The White House has been criticized for underestimating the threat and controlling messages by directing health officials and scientists to coordinate public statements and publications related to the virus with Vice President Mike Pence's office.

sourceString: Overall approval of Trump's management of the crisis has been polarized along partisan lines.
targetString: ट्रम्प द्वारा संकट के प्रबंधन की समग्र पसंदगी पक्षपातपूर्ण रूपों के साथ बँटी हुई है।
en-mt: Trump's overall choice of crisis management is divided with partisan forms.

sourceString: Some U.S. officials and commentators criticized the U.S. reliance on importation of critical materials, including essential medical supplies, from China.
targetString: कुछ अमेरिकी अधिकारियों और टिप्पणीकारों ने चीन से आवश्यक चिकित्सा आपूर्ति आपूर्तियों सहित महत्वपूर्ण सामग्रियों के आयात पर अमेरिकी निर्भरता की आलोचना की।
en-mt: Some U.S. officials and commentators criticized U.S. reliance on imports of critical materials, including essential medical supplies supplies, from China.

sourceString: An analysis of air travel patterns was used to map and predict patterns of spread and was published in The Journal of Travel Medicine in mid-January 2020.
targetString: हवाई यात्रा ढ़ाँचे का इस्तेमाल विश्लेषण प्रसार का नक्शा बनाने और पूर्वानुमान लगाने के लिए किया गया था और इसे द जर्नल ऑफ़ ट्रैवल मेडिसिन में जनवरी 2020 के मध्य में प्रकाशित किया गया था।
en-mt: The air travel framework was used to analyse, map and forecast the spread and was published in The Journal of Travel Medicine in mid-January 2020.

sourceString: Based on 2018 information from the International Air Transport Association, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, and Taipei had the largest volume of travellers from Wuhan.
targetString: इंटरनेशनल एयर ट्रांसपोर्ट एसोसिएशन से 2018 की जानकारी के आधार पर बैंकाक, हॉन्ग कॉन्ग, टोक्यो, और ताइपे में वुहान से यात्रियों की सबसे बड़ी मात्रा थी।
en-mt: Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, and Taipei had the largest volume of passengers from Wuhan, based on 2018 information from the International Air Transport Association.

sourceString: Dubai, Sydney, and Melbourne were also reported as popular destinations for people travelling from Wuhan.
targetString: वुहान से यात्रा करने वाले लोगों के लिए दुबई, सिडनी और मेलबर्न को भी लोकप्रिय स्थलों के रूप में सूचित किया गया था।
en-mt: Dubai, Sydney and Melbourne were also reported as popular destinations for people travelling from Wuhan.

sourceString: Bali was reported as least able among the 20 most popular destination cities in terms of preparedness, while cities in Australia were considered most able.Australia released its Emergency Response Plan for Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) on 7 February.
targetString: बाली को तैयारियों के मामले में 20 सबसे लोकप्रिय गंतव्य शहरों में से सबसे कम सक्षम बताया गया, जबकि ऑस्ट्रेलिया के शहरों को सबसे अधिक सक्षम माना गया था। ऑस्ट्रेलिया ने 7 फरवरी को नोवेल कोरोनावायरस (COVID-19) के लिए अपनी आपातकालीन प्रतिक्रिया योजना जारी की।
en-mt: Bali was rated as the least capable of the 20 most popular destination cities in terms of preparedness, while cities in Australia were rated as the most capable. Australia released its emergency response plan for the novel coronavirus (COVID-19) on February 7.

sourceString: It stated that much was yet to be discovered about COVID-19, and that Australia would emphasize border control and communication in its response to the pandemic.
targetString: इसके अनुसार COVID-19 के बारे में बहुत कुछ पता नहीं चल पाया है, और यह कि ऑस्ट्रेलिया महामारी की प्रतिक्रिया में सीमा नियंत्रण और संचार पर जोर देगा।
en-mt: According to it not much is known about COVID-19, and that Australia will insist on border control and communication in response to the pandemic.

sourceString: On 21 March, a human biosecurity emergency was declared in Australia.
targetString: 21 मार्च को, ऑस्ट्रेलिया में एक मानव जैव सुरक्षा आपातकाल घोषित किया गया था।
en-mt: On March 21, a human biosecurity emergency was declared in Australia.

sourceString: Owing to the effective quarantine of public transport in Wuhan and Hubei, several countries have planned to evacuate their citizens and diplomatic staff from the area, primarily through chartered flights of the home nation, with Chinese authorities providing clearance.
targetString: वुहान और हुबेई में सार्वजनिक परिवहन के प्रभावी क्वारंटीन के कारण, कई देशों ने अपने नागरिकों और राजनयिक कर्मचारियों को क्षेत्र से बाहर निकालने की योजना बनाई है, मुख्य रूप से गृह राष्ट्र की चार्टर्ड उड़ानों के माध्यम से, जिसके लिए चीनी प्राधिकरणों ने मंजूरी प्रदान की है।
en-mt: Due to the effective quarantine of public transport in Wuhan and Hubei, many countries have planned to evacuate their citizens and diplomatic staff from the region, mainly through chartered flights to the home nation, for which Chinese authorities have granted approval.

sourceString: Canada, the United States, Japan, India, Sri Lanka, Australia, France, Argentina, Germany, and Thailand were among the first to plan the evacuation of their citizens.
targetString: कनाडा, अमेरिका, जापान, भारत, श्रीलंका, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, फ्रांस, अर्जेंटीना, जर्मनी और थाईलैंड अपने नागरिकों की निकालने की योजना बनाने वाले पहले देश थे।
en-mt: Canada, the US, Japan, India, Sri Lanka, Australia, France, Argentina, Germany and Thailand were the first countries to plan the evacuation of their citizens.

sourceString: Pakistan has said that it will not be evacuating any citizens from China.
targetString: पाकिस्तान ने कहा है कि वह चीन से किसी भी नागरिक को नहीं निकालेगा।
en-mt: Pakistan has said that it will not expel any citizen from China.

sourceString: On 7 February, Brazil evacuated 34 Brazilians or family members in addition to four Poles, a Chinese person, and an Indian citizen.
targetString: 7 फरवरी को, ब्राजील ने चार पोल्स, एक चीनी व्यक्ति और एक भारतीय नागरिक के अलावा 34 ब्राजीलियाई या परिवार के सदस्यों को निकाला।
en-mt: On February 7, Brazil evacuated 34 Brazilians or family members, besides four Poles, a Chinese man and an Indian national.

sourceString: The citizens of Poland, China, and India deplaned in Poland, where the Brazilian plane made a stopover before following its route to Brazil.
targetString: पोलैंड, चीन, और भारत के नागरिक पोलैंड में विमान से उतर गए, जहाँ ब्राजील का विमान रुकने के बाद ब्राज़ील के अपने मार्ग पर चला गया।
en-mt: Citizens of Poland, China, and India disembarked in Poland, where the Brazilian plane went on its route to Brazil after stopping.

sourceString: Brazilian citizens who went to Wuhan were quarantined at a military base near Brasília.
targetString: ब्राजील के नागरिक जो वुहान गए थे, ब्रासीलिया के पास एक सैन्य अड्डे पर क्वारंटीन किए गए थे।
en-mt: Brazilian citizens who went to Wuhan were quarantined at a military base near Brasilia.

sourceString: On the same day, 215 Canadians (176 from the first plane, and 39 from a second plane chartered by the U.S. government) were evacuated from Wuhan to CFB Trenton to be quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: उसी दिन, 215 कनेडियन नागरिक (पहले विमान से 176, और अमेरिकी सरकार द्वारा चार्टर्ड एक दूसरे विमान से 39) वुहान से CFB ट्रेंटन के लिए निकाले गए थे और दो सप्ताह के लिए क्वारंटीन किए गए थे।
en-mt: On the same day, 215 Canadian citizens (176 from the first plane, and 39 from a second plane chartered by the US government) were evacuated from Wuhan to CFB Trenton and quarantined for two weeks.

sourceString: On 11 February, another plane of 185 Canadians from Wuhan landed at CFB Trenton.
targetString: 11 फरवरी को, वुहान से 185 कनेडियन नागरिकों का एक और विमान CFB ट्रेंटन में उतरा।
en-mt: On February 11, another plane carrying 185 Canadian citizens from Wuhan landed at CFB Trenton.

sourceString: Australian authorities evacuated 277 citizens on 3 and 4 February to the Christmas Island Detention Centre, which had been repurposed as a quarantine facility, where they remained for 14 days.
targetString: ऑस्ट्रेलियाई प्राधिकरणों ने 3 और 4 फरवरी को 277 नागरिकों को निकालकर क्रिसमस आइलैंड डिटेंशन सेंटर में पहुंचाया, जिसे एक क्वारंटीन सुविधा के रूप में पुनर्निर्मित किया गया था, जहाँ वे 14 दिनों तक रहे थे।
en-mt: Australian authorities evacuated 277 citizens on February 3 and 4 to the Christmas Island Detention Centre, which was renovated as a quarantine facility, where they stayed for 14 days.

sourceString: A New Zealand evacuation flight arrived in Auckland on 5 February; its passengers (including some from Australia and the Pacific) were quarantined at a naval base in Whangaparoa, north of Auckland.
targetString: 5 फरवरी को ऑकलैंड में एक न्यूजीलैंड निर्वातन उड़ान आई; इसके यात्रियों (कुछ ऑस्ट्रेलिया से और प्रशांत क्षेत्र से सहित) को ऑकलैंड के उत्तर में वांगापरोआ में एक नौसैनिक अड्डे पर क्वारंटीन किया गया था।
en-mt: A New Zealand Evacuation flight arrived in Auckland on 5 February; Its passengers (including some from Australia and the Pacific) were quarantined at a naval base in Vangaparoa, north of Auckland.

sourceString: On 15 February, the United States announced that it would evacuate Americans aboard the cruise ship Diamond Princess.
targetString: 15 फरवरी को, अमेरिका ने घोषणा की कि वह क्रूज जहाज डायमंड प्रिंसेज़ पर सवार अमेरिकियों को निकालेगा।
en-mt: On February 15, the US announced that it would evacuate Americans aboard the cruise ship Diamond Princess.

sourceString: On 21 February, a plane carrying 129 Canadian passengers who had been evacuated from Diamond Princess landed in Trenton, Ontario.
targetString: 21 फरवरी को, 129 कनेडियन यात्रियों को लेकर एक विमान ओंटारियो के ट्रेंटन में उतरा जो डायमंड प्रिंसेस से निकाले गए थे।
en-mt: On February 21, a plane carrying 129 Canadian passengers landed in Trenton, Ontario who had been evacuated from the Diamond Princess.

sourceString: In early March, the Indian government began evacuating its citizens from Iran.On 14 March a South African Airways aircraft chartered by the South African Government repatriated 112 South African citizens.
targetString: मार्च की शुरुआत में, भारत सरकार ने ईरान से अपने नागरिकों को निकालना शुरू कर दिया। 14 मार्च को दक्षिण अफ्रीकी सरकार द्वारा चार्टर्ड एक साउथ अफ्रीकन एयरवेज़ विमान ने 112 दक्षिण अफ्रीकी नागरिकों को प्रत्यावर्तित किया।
en-mt: In early March, the Indian government began evacuating its citizens from Iran. On March 14, a South African Airways plane chartered by the South African government repatriated 112 South African nationals.

sourceString: Medical screening was performed prior to departure, and four South Africans who were showing signs of coronavirus were left behind to mitigate risk.
targetString: प्रस्थान से पहले चिकित्सा जांच की गई थी, और चार दक्षिण अफ्रीकी जो कोरोनावायरस के लक्षण दिखा रहे थे, जोखिम के शमन के लिए पीछे छोड़ दिए गए थे।
en-mt: Medical screening was done before departure, and four South Africans who were showing symptoms of coronavirus were left behind for mitigation of risk.

sourceString: Only South Africans who tested negative were repatriated.
targetString: केवल नेगेटिव परीक्षण वाले दक्षिण अफ्रीकियों को प्रत्यावर्तित किया गया था।
en-mt: Only South Africans who tested negative were repatriated.

sourceString: Test results cleared all the South Africans, including the flight crew, pilots, hotel staff, police and soldiers involved in the humanitarian mission who, as a precautionary measure, all remained under observation and in quarantine for a 14-day period at The Ranch Resort.
targetString: परीक्षण के परिणामों से सभी दक्षिण अफ्रीकियों को संक्रमण रहित घोषित किया गया, जिसमें मानवीय मिशन में शामिल उड़ान दल, पायलट, होटल कर्मचारी, पुलिस और सैनिक शामिल थे, जो सभी सावधानी के तौर पर निगरानी में रहे और 14 दिन की अवधि के लिए द रंच रिज़ॉर्ट में क्वारंटीन में रहे।
en-mt: The test results declared all South Africans infection-free, including flight crews, pilots, hotel staff, police and soldiers involved in the humanitarian mission, all of whom remained under observation as a precaution and quarantined at The Ranch Resort for a period of 14 days.

sourceString: On 20 March, the United States began to partially withdrawal its troops from Iraq due to the pandemic.
targetString: 20 मार्च को, अमेरिका ने महामारी के कारण इराक से अपने सैनिकों को आंशिक रूप से वापस लेना शुरू कर दिया।
en-mt: On March 20, the US began partially withdrawing its troops from Iraq due to the pandemic.

sourceString: On 5 February, the Chinese foreign ministry stated that 21 countries (including Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad and Tobago, Egypt, and Iran) had sent aid to China.
targetString: 5 फरवरी को, चीनी विदेश मंत्रालय ने कहा कि 21 देशों (बेलारूस, पाकिस्तान, त्रिनिदाद और टोबैगो, मिस्र और ईरान सहित) ने चीन को सहायता भेजी थी।
en-mt: On February 5, the Chinese Foreign Ministry said that 21 countries (including Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad and Tobago, Egypt and Iran) had sent aid to China.

sourceString: Some Chinese students at American universities joined together to help send aid to virus-stricken parts of China, with a joint group in the greater Chicago area reportedly managing to send 50,000 N95 masks to hospitals in the Hubei province on 30 January.The humanitarian aid organization Direct Relief, in coordination with FedEx, sent 200,000 face masks along with other personal protective equipment, including gloves and gowns, by emergency airlift to the Wuhan Union Hospital by 30 January.
targetString: अमेरिकी विश्वविद्यालयों के कुछ चीनी छात्र चीन के वायरस से प्रभावित हिस्सों को सहायता भेजने में मदद करने के लिए एकजुट हुए, जिसमें कथित तौर पर शिकागो क्षेत्र में एक संयुक्त समूह ने 30 जनवरी को हुबेई प्रांत के अस्पतालों में 50,000 N95 मास्क भेजे। मानवीय सहायता संगठन डायरेक्ट रिलीफ ने FedEx के साथ समन्वय में, 30 जनवरी तक आपातकालीन उड़ान द्वारा वुहान यूनियन अस्पताल में दस्ताने और गाउन सहित अन्य व्यक्तिगत सुरक्षा उपकरणों के साथ 200,000 चेहरे के मास्क भेजे।
en-mt: Some Chinese students from U.S. universities united to help send aid to parts of China affected by the virus, with a joint group reportedly in the Chicago area sending 50,000 N95 masks to hospitals in Hubei province on January 30. Humanitarian aid organization Direct Relief, in coordination with FedEx, sent 200,000 face masks along with other personal protective equipment, including gloves and gowns, to Wuhan Union Hospital by emergency flight by January 30.

sourceString: On 5 February, Bill and Melinda Gates announced a $100 million donation to the WHO to fund vaccine research and treatment efforts along with protecting "at-risk populations in Africa and South Asia".
targetString: 5 फरवरी को, बिल और मेलिंडा गेट्स ने "अफ्रीका और दक्षिण एशिया में जोखिम वाली आबादी" की रक्षा के साथ-साथ टीके के अनुसंधान और उपचार के प्रयासों के वित्तपोषण के लिए WHO को $100 मिलियन के दान की घोषणा की।
en-mt: On February 5, Bill and Melinda Gates announced a $100 million donation to the WHO to protect "at-risk populations in Africa and South Asia" as well as to finance vaccine research and treatment efforts.

sourceString: Interaksyon reported that the Chinese government donated 200,000 masks to the Philippines on 6 February, after Senator Richard Gordon shipped 3.16 million masks to Wuhan.
targetString: इंटरेक्सेऑन ने सूचित किया कि चीनी सरकार ने 6 फरवरी को फिलीपींस को 200,000 मास्क दान किए, जब सीनेटर रिचर्ड गॉर्डन ने वुहान को 3.16 मिलियन मास्क भेजे।
en-mt: Interexon informed that the Chinese government donated 200,000 masks to the Philippines on February 6, when Senator Richard Gordon sent 3.16 million masks to Wuhan.

sourceString: On 19 February, the Singapore Red Cross announced that it would send $2.26 million worth of aid to China.
targetString: 19 फरवरी को, सिंगापुर रेड क्रॉस ने घोषणा की कि वह चीन को $2.26 मिलियन की सहायता राशि भेजेगा।
en-mt: On February 19, the Singapore Red Cross announced that it would send $2.26 million in aid to China.

sourceString: Japan donated one million face masks to Wuhan, Turkey dispatched medical equipment, Russia sent more than 13 tonnes of medical supplies to Wuhan, Malaysia announced a donation of 18 million medical gloves to China, Germany delivered various medical supplies including 10,000 Hazmat suits, and the United States donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to China and promised an additional $100 million in financial support to affected countries.After cases in China seemed to stabilize, the country has been sending aid to various nations hit by the pandemic.
targetString: जापान ने वुहान में एक मिलियन चेहरे के मास्क दान किए, तुर्की ने चिकित्सा उपकरण भेजे, रूस ने वुहान में 13 टन से अधिक चिकित्सा आपूर्ति भेजी, मलेशिया ने चीन को 18 मिलियन चिकित्सा दस्ताने दान करने की घोषणा की, जर्मनी ने 10,000 हज़मत सूट सहित विभिन्न चिकित्सा आपूर्ति प्रदान की, और अमेरिका ने चीन को 17.8 टन चिकित्सा आपूर्ति का दान दिया और प्रभावित देशों को अतिरिक्त सहायता में वित्तीय $100 मिलियन का वादा किया। चीन में मामले स्थिर प्रतीत होने के बाद, देश महामारी की चपेट में आए विभिन्न देशों को सहायता भेज रहा है।
en-mt: Japan donated one million face masks to Wuhan, Turkey sent medical equipment, Russia sent more than 13 tons of medical supplies to Wuhan, Malaysia announced to donate 18 million medical gloves to China, Germany provided various medical supplies including 10,000 Hazmat suits, and the US donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to China and pledged financial $100 million in additional assistance to affected countries. I did. After cases in China appeared to be stable, the country has been sending aid to various countries hit by the pandemic.

sourceString: In March, China, Cuba and Russia sent medical supplies and experts to help Italy deal with its coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: मार्च में, चीन, क्यूबा और रूस ने इटली को अपने कोरोनावायरस प्रकोप से निपटने में मदद करने के लिए चिकित्सा आपूर्ति और विशेषज्ञों को भेजा।
en-mt: In March, China, Cuba and Russia sent medical supplies and experts to help Italy deal with its coronavirus outbreak.

sourceString: Businessman Jack Ma sent 1.1 million testing kits, 6 million face masks, and 60,000 protective suits to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia for distribution by the African Union.
targetString: व्यवसायी जैक मा ने अफ्रीकी संघ द्वारा वितरण के लिए 1.1 मिलियन परीक्षण किट, 6 मिलियन चेहरे के मास्क, और 60,000 सुरक्षात्मक सूट अदीस अबाबा, इथियोपिया को भेजे।
en-mt: Businessman Jack Ma sent 1.1 million testing kits, 6 million face masks, and 60,000 protective suits to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, for distribution by the African Union.

sourceString: He later sent 5,000 testing kits, 100,000 face masks and 5 ventilators to Panama.
targetString: बाद में उन्होंने पनामा को 5,000 परीक्षण किट, 100,000 चेहरे के मास्क और 5 वेंटिलेटर भेजे।
en-mt: He later sent 5,000 testing kits, 100,000 face masks and 5 ventilators to Panama.

sourceString: Ma also donated medical supplies to Canada.The Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, and the Czech Republic expressed their concerns over Chinese-made masks and test kits.
targetString: मा ने कनाडा को चिकित्सा आपूर्ति भी दान दी। नीदरलैंड, स्पेन, तुर्की, जॉर्जिया और चेक गणराज्य ने चीन-निर्मित मास्क और परीक्षण किट पर अपनी चिंताओं को व्यक्त किया।
en-mt: Ma also donated medical supplies to Canada. The Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia and the Czech Republic expressed their concerns over China-made masks and testing kits.

sourceString: For instance, Spain withdrew 58,000 Chinese-made coronavirus testing kits with an accuracy rate of just 30%, meanwhile, the Netherlands recalled 600,000 Chinese face masks which were defective.
targetString: उदाहरण के लिए, स्पेन ने सिर्फ 30% की सटीकता दर वाली 58,000 चीन-निर्मित कोरोनावायरस परीक्षण किट वापस मंगा ली, इस बीच, नीदरलैंड ने 600,000 चीनी चेहरे के मास्क वापस मंगा लिए जो दोषपूर्ण थे।
en-mt: Spain, for example, recalled 58,000 China-made coronavirus testing kits with an accuracy rate of just 30%, meanwhile, the Netherlands recalled 600,000 Chinese face masks that were defective.

sourceString: Belgium recalled 100,000 unusable masks, thought to be from China, but were in fact from Colombia.
targetString: बेल्जियम ने 100,000 अनुपयोगी मास्क वापस मंगा लिए, जिन्हें चीन से आए माना जाता था, लेकिन वास्तव में कोलंबिया से आए थे।
en-mt: Belgium recalled 100,000 unusable masks, which were thought to have come from China but actually came from Colombia.

sourceString: On the other hand, Chinese aid has been well-received in parts of Latin America and Africa.On 2 April, the World Bank launched emergency support operations for developing countries.
targetString: दूसरी ओर, लैटिन अमेरिका और अफ्रीका के कुछ हिस्सों में चीनी सहायता अच्छी तरह से प्राप्त हुई है। 2 अप्रैल को, विश्व बैंक ने विकासशील देशों के लिए आपातकालीन सहायता अभियान शुरू किए।
en-mt: On the other hand, Chinese aid has been well received in parts of Latin America and Africa. On April 2, the World Bank launched emergency aid operations for developing countries.

sourceString: The WHO has commended the efforts of Chinese authorities in managing and containing the epidemic.
targetString: WHO ने महामारी के प्रबंधन और संरोधन में चीनी प्राधिकरणों के प्रयासों की सराहना की है।
en-mt: WHO has appreciated the efforts of Chinese authorities in managing and containing the pandemic.

sourceString: The WHO noted the contrast between the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak, where Chinese authorities were accused of secrecy that impeded prevention and containment efforts, and the current crisis where the central government "has provided regular updates to avoid panic ahead of Lunar New Year holidays".
targetString: WHO ने 2002-2004 SARS के प्रकोप, जहां चीनी प्राधिकरणों पर गोपनीयता का आरोप लगाया गया था जिसने रोकथाम और संरोधन के प्रयासों में बाधा डाली, और वर्तमान संकट जहां केंद्र सरकार ने "चन्द्र नव वर्ष की छुट्टियों से पहले डर से बचने के लिए नियमित रूप से अपडेट प्रदान किए हैं" के बीच अंतर का उल्लेख किया।
en-mt: The WHO noted the difference between the 2002-2004 SARS outbreak, where Chinese authorities were accused of secrecy that hindered prevention and containment efforts, and the current crisis where the central government has "provided regular updates to avoid fear ahead of the Lunar New Year holidays".

sourceString: On 23 January, in reaction to the central authorities' decision to implement a transportation ban in Wuhan, WHO representative Gauden Galea remarked that while it was "certainly not a recommendation the WHO has made", it was also "a very important indication of the commitment to contain the epidemic in the place where it is most concentrated" and called it "unprecedented in public health history".On 30 January, following confirmation of human-to-human transmission outside China and the increase in the number of cases in other countries, the WHO declared the outbreak a Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC), the sixth PHEIC since the measure was first invoked during the 2009 swine flu pandemic.
targetString: 23 जनवरी को, वुहान में परिवहन प्रतिबंध को लागू करने के केंद्रीय प्राधिकरणों के फैसले की प्रतिक्रिया में, WHO के प्रतिनिधि गौडेन गालिया ने टिप्पणी की कि जबकि "निश्चित रूप से WHO ने अनुशंसा नहीं की थी" यह "उस जगह पर महामारी को संरोधित करने की प्रतिबद्धता का एक बहुत ही महत्वपूर्ण संकेत था जहां यह सबसे अधिक केंद्रित है" और इसे "सार्वजनिक स्वास्थ्य इतिहास में अभूतपूर्व" कहा। 30 जनवरी को, चीन के बाहर मानव-से-मानव संचरण की पुष्टि और अन्य मामलों की संख्या में वृद्धि के बाद WHO ने इस प्रकोप को अंतर्राष्ट्रीय चिंता का सार्वजनिक स्वास्थ्य आपातकाल (PHEIC) घोषित किया, जो 2009 की स्वाइन फ्लू महामारी के दौरान पहली बार उपाय किए जाने के बाद से छठा PHEIC है।
en-mt: On January 23, in response to the central authorities' decision to implement the transport ban in Wuhan, WHO representative Gauden Galia commented that while "certainly not recommended by the WHO" it was "a very important sign of a commitment to contain the pandemic in the place where it is most concentrated" and called it "unprecedented in public health history". On January 30, the WHO declared the outbreak a Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC), the sixth PHEIC since the 2009 swine flu pandemic was first taken after the number of confirmed human-to-human transmission outside China and an increase in the number of other cases.

sourceString: WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom said that the PHEIC was due to "the risk of global spread, especially to low- and middle-income countries without robust health systems.
targetString: WHO के महानिदेशक टेड्रोस अदनोम ने कहा कि PHEIC का कारण था "वैश्विक प्रसार का जोखिम, विशेष रूप से मजबूत स्वास्थ्य प्रणालियों के बिना कम और मध्यम आय वाले देशों में।
en-mt: WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus said the cause of PHEIC was "the risk of global spread, especially in low- and middle-income countries without robust health systems."

sourceString: In response to the implementations of travel restrictions, Tedros stated that "there is no reason for measures that unnecessarily interfere with international travel and trade" and that the "WHO doesn't recommend limiting trade and movement."
targetString: यात्रा प्रतिबंधों के कार्यान्वयन की प्रतिक्रिया में, टेड्रोस ने कहा कि "ऐसे उपायों का कोई कारण नहीं है जो अनावश्यक रूप से अंतर्राष्ट्रीय यात्रा और व्यापार में हस्तक्षेप करते हैं" और यह कि "WHO व्यापार और आवाजाही को सीमित करने की अनुशंसा नहीं करता है।"
en-mt: In response to the implementation of travel restrictions, Tedros said there is "no reason for measures that unnecessarily interfere with international travel and trade" and that "the WHO does not recommend limiting trade and movement." "

sourceString: On 5 February, the WHO appealed to the global community for a $675 million contribution to fund strategic preparedness in low-income countries, citing the urgency to support those countries which "do not have the systems in place to detect people who have contracted the virus, even if it were to emerge".
targetString: 5 फरवरी को, WHO ने वैश्विक समुदाय से कम आय वाले देशों में रणनीतिक तैयारी के लिए $675 मिलियन के योगदान की अपील की, जिसमें उन देशों की मदद करने की आवश्यकता का हवाला दिया गया, जिनके पास "वायरस से संक्रमित लोगों का पता लगाने के लिए प्रणालियाँ स्थापित नहीं है, भले ही यह उभरने वाला था"।
en-mt: On February 5, the WHO appealed to the global community to contribute $675 million for strategic preparedness in low-income countries, citing the need to help countries that "do not have systems in place to detect people infected with the virus, even though it was about to emerge".

sourceString: Tedros further made statements declaring that "we are only as strong as our weakest link" and urged the international community to "invest today or pay more later".On 11 February, the WHO in a press conference established COVID-19 as the name of the disease.
targetString: टेड्रोस ने आगे बयानों में घोषणा की, कि "हम केवल उतने मजबूत हैं जितनी हमारी सबसे कमजोर कड़ी" और अंतर्राष्ट्रीय समुदाय से "आज निवेश करने या बाद में अधिक भुगतान करने" का आग्रह किया। 11 फरवरी को, WHO ने एक प्रेस कॉन्फ्रेंस में COVID-19 की रोग के नाम के रूप में स्थापना की।
en-mt: Tedros further declared, in statements, that "we are only as strong as our weakest link" and urged the international community to "invest today or pay more later". On February 11, the WHO established COVID-19 as the name of the disease at a press conference.

sourceString: On the same day, Tedros stated that UN Secretary-General António Guterres had agreed to provide the "power of the entire UN system in the response".
targetString: उसी दिन, टेड्रोस ने कहा कि संयुक्त राष्ट्र महासचिव एंटोनियो गुटेरेस "प्रतिक्रिया में संपूर्ण संयुक्त राष्ट्र प्रणाली की शक्ति" प्रदान करने के लिए सहमत हुए थे।
en-mt: On the same day, Tedros said UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres had agreed to provide "the power of the entire UN system in response".

sourceString: A UN Crisis Management Team was activated as a result, allowing coordination of the entire United Nations response, which the WHO states will allow them to "focus on the health response while the other agencies can bring their expertise to bear on the wider social, economic and developmental implications of the outbreak".
targetString: परिणामस्वरूप संयुक्त राष्ट्र के एक संकट प्रबंधन दल को सक्रिय किया गया था, जिसने पूरे संयुक्त राष्ट्र की प्रतिक्रिया का समन्वय किया, जो WHO के अनुसार उन्हें "स्वास्थ्य प्रतिक्रिया पर ध्यान केंद्रित करने में सक्षम बनाएगा, जबकि अन्य एजेंसियां प्रकोप के व्यापक सामाजिक, आर्थिक और विकास संबंधी निहितार्थों को सहन करने में अपनी विशेषज्ञता का उपयोग कर सकती हैं।"
en-mt: As a result a UN crisis management team was activated, which coordinated the response of the entire UN, which according to the WHO would enable them to "focus on the health response, while other agencies can use their expertise in tolerating the broader social, economic and developmental implications of the outbreak." "

sourceString: On 14 February, a WHO-led Joint Mission Team with China was activated to provide international and WHO experts on the ground in China to assist in the domestic management and evaluate "the severity and the transmissibility of the disease" by hosting workshops and meetings with key national-level institutions and to conduct field visits to assess the "impact of response activities at provincial and county levels, including urban and rural settings".On 25 February, the WHO declared that "the world should do more to prepare for a possible coronavirus pandemic," stating that while it was still too early to call it a pandemic, countries should nonetheless be "in a phase of preparedness".
targetString: 14 फरवरी को, चीन के साथ WHO के नेतृत्व वाली एक संयुक्त मिशन टीम को, घरेलू प्रबंधन में सहायता करने के लिए और कार्यशालाओं और प्रमुख राष्ट्रीय-स्तर के संस्थानों के साथ बैठकों की मेजबानी करके "रोग की गंभीरता और संक्रामकता" का मूल्यांकन करने के लिए और "शहरी और ग्रामीण व्यवस्थाओं सहित प्रांतीय और काउंटी स्तरों पर प्रतिक्रिया गतिविधियों के प्रभाव" का आकलन करने के लिए क्षेत्र का दौरा करने के लिए, चीन में अंतर्राष्ट्रीय और WHO विशेषज्ञों को जमीनी हकीकत प्रदान करने के लिए सक्रिय किया गया था। 25 फरवरी को, WHO ने घोषणा की कि "विश्व को संभव कोरोनावायरस महामारी के लिए तैयार होने के लिए और अधिक प्रयास करने चाहिए," यह कहते हुए कि हालाँकि इसे अभी महामारी कहना बहुत जल्दबाजी होगी, लेकिन देशों को "तैयार होने के एक चरण में" रहना चाहिए।
en-mt: On February 14, a WHO-led joint mission team, along with China, visited the region to assess the "severity and infectivity of the disease" by assisting in household management and by hosting workshops and meetings with leading national-level institutions and to assess the "impact of response activities at provincial and county levels, including urban and rural settings".  International and WHO experts in China were activated to provide the ground reality. On February 25, the WHO announced that "the world must do more to prepare for a possible coronavirus pandemic," adding that although it is too early to call it a pandemic right now, countries should remain "in a phase of preparedness".

sourceString: In response to a developing outbreak in Iran, the WHO sent a Joint Mission Team there to assess the situation.On 28 February, WHO officials said that the coronavirus threat assessment at the global level would be raised from "high" to "very high", its highest level of alert and risk assessment.
targetString: ईरान में एक विकासशील प्रकोप की प्रतिक्रिया में, WHO ने स्थिति का आकलन करने के लिए एक संयुक्त मिशन टीम को भेजा। 28 फरवरी को, WHO के प्राधिकरणों ने कहा कि वैश्विक स्तर पर कोरोनावायरस के खतरे का आकलन "उच्च" से "बहुत अधिक" तक किया जाएगा, जो सतर्कता और जोखिम आकलन का उच्चतम स्तर है।
en-mt: In response to a developing outbreak in Iran, the WHO sent a joint mission team to assess the situation. On February 28, WHO authorities said that the threat of coronavirus globally will be assessed from "high" to "very high", the highest level of vigilance and risk assessment.

sourceString: Mike Ryan, executive director of the WHO's health emergencies program, warned in a statement that "This is a reality check for every government on the planet: Wake up.
targetString: WHO के स्वास्थ्य आपातकालीन कार्यक्रम के कार्यकारी निदेशक माइक रयान ने एक बयान में चेतावनी दी कि "यह पृथ्वी पर हर सरकार के लिए एक वास्तविकता की जाँच है: यह जागने का समय है।
en-mt: Mike Ryan, executive director of the WHO's health emergency programme, warned in a statement that "this is a reality check for every government on Earth: it's time to wake up."

sourceString: This virus may be on its way and you need to be ready," urging that the right response measures could help the world avoid "the worst of it".
targetString: यह वायरस अपने रास्ते पर आ रहा हो सकता है और आपको तैयार रहने की आवश्यकता है," यह आग्रह करते हुए कि सही प्रतिक्रिया के उपाय विश्व को "इसके सबसे बुरे रूप से" बचने में मदद कर सकते हैं।
en-mt: This virus may be coming its way and you need to be prepared," it said, urging that the right response measures can help the world avoid "at its worst".

sourceString: Ryan further stated that the current data did not warrant public health officials to declare a global pandemic, saying that such a declaration would mean "we're essentially accepting that every human on the planet will be exposed to that virus."
targetString: रेयान ने आगे कहा कि वर्तमान आँकाड़ों ने सार्वजनिक स्वास्थ्य प्राधिकरणों को वैश्विक महामारी घोषित करने के लिए आश्वस्त नहीं किया है, यह कहते हुए कि इस तरह की घोषणा का मतलब होगा "हम अनिवार्य रूप से स्वीकार कर रहे हैं कि पृथ्वी पर प्रत्येक मनुष्य उस वायरस के संपर्क में आएगा।"
en-mt: Ryan further said that the current statistics do not convince public health authorities to declare a global pandemic, adding that such a declaration would mean "we are essentially accepting that every human being on Earth will be exposed to that virus." "

sourceString: On 11 March, the WHO declared the coronavirus outbreak a pandemic.
targetString: 11 मार्च को, WHO ने कोरोनावायरस प्रकोप को महामारी घोषित किया।
en-mt: On March 11, the WHO declared the coronavirus outbreak a pandemic.

sourceString: The Director-General said that the WHO was "deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity, and by the alarming levels of inaction".The WHO has faced significant criticism for what is seen as inadequate handling of the pandemic, including the late declaration of a public health emergency and the classification of the virus as a pandemic.
targetString: महानिदेशक ने कहा कि WHO "प्रसार और गंभीरता के खतरनाक स्तर और निष्क्रियता के खतरनाक स्तर दोनों से गहन रूप से चिंतित था"। WHO ने एक सार्वजनिक स्वास्थ्य आपातकाल घोषणा करने और एक महामारी के रूप में वायरस का वर्गीकरण करने में देरी सहित, महामारी के अपर्याप्त प्रबंधन के रूप में बड़ी आलोचना का सामना किया है।
en-mt: The Director-General said the WHO was "deeply concerned by both the alarming levels of spread and severity and the alarming levels of inaction". The WHO has faced major criticism in the form of inadequate management of the pandemic, including delays in declaring a public health emergency and classifying the virus as a pandemic.

sourceString: The backlash included a petition for the WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom to tender his resignation, signed by 733,000 people as of 6 April.
targetString: प्रतिक्षेप में 6 अप्रैल तक 733,000 लोगों द्वारा हस्ताक्षरित, WHO के महानिदेशक टेड्रोस अदनोम के इस्तीफे के लिए एक याचिका शामिल थी।
en-mt: The retaliation included a petition for the resignation of WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, signed by 733,000 people as of April 6.

sourceString: On 26 March 2020, dozens of UN human rights experts emphasized respecting the rights of every individual during the COVID-19 pandemic.
targetString: 26 मार्च 2020 को संयुक्त राष्ट्र के दर्जनों मानवाधिकार विशेषज्ञों ने COVID-19 महामारी के दौरान हर व्यक्ति के अधिकारों का सम्मान करने पर जोर दिया।
en-mt: On 26 March 2020, dozens of UN human rights experts stressed on respecting the rights of every individual during the COVID-19 pandemic.

sourceString: The expert group stated that everyone is entitled to life-saving interventions and the government holds this responsibility.
targetString: विशेषज्ञ समूह ने कहा कि हर कोई जीवन-रक्षक हस्तक्षेपों का हकदार है और यह जिम्मेदारी सरकार की है।
en-mt: The expert group said that everyone is entitled to life-saving interventions and it is the responsibility of the government.

sourceString: The group stressed that the lack of resources or health insurance should never serve as a justification for discrimination against a specific group.
targetString: समूह ने जोर देकर कहा कि संसाधनों या स्वास्थ्य बीमा की कमी को कभी भी एक विशिष्ट समूह के प्रति भेदभाव के औचित्य के रूप में इस्तेमाल नहीं किया जाना चाहिए।
en-mt: The group stressed that lack of resources or health insurance should never be used as a justification for discrimination against a specific group.

sourceString: The experts underscored that every individual has the right to health, including people with disabilities, belonging to minority groups, older people, internally displaced people, the homeless, those living in extremely poor conditions, people in detention, as well as refugees and other unspecified groups in need of government support.
targetString: विशेषज्ञों ने इस बात पर ज़ोर दिया कि विकलांग लोगों, अल्पसंख्यक समूहों, वृद्ध लोगों, आंतरिक रूप से विस्थापित लोगों, बेघर, अति दरिद्र परिस्थितियों में रहने वाले लोग, संरोध में रहने वाले लोग, साथ ही शरणार्थी और सरकारी सहायता की आवश्यकता वाले अन्य अनिर्दिष्ट समूह, सहित प्रत्येक व्यक्ति को स्वास्थ्य का अधिकार है।
en-mt: The experts emphasized that everyone, including people with disabilities, minority groups, older people, internally displaced people, homeless, people living in extreme poverty, people living in detention, as well as refugees and other undocumented groups in need of government assistance, has a right to health.

sourceString: International governmental organizations are addressing the economic and social impacts of the COVID-19 crisis.
targetString: अंतर्राष्ट्रीय सरकारी संगठन COVID-19 संकट के आर्थिक और सामाजिक प्रभावों को संबोधित कर रहे हैं।
en-mt: International government organizations are addressing the economic and social impacts of the COVID-19 crisis.

sourceString: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development has launched a platform to provide timely and comprehensive information on policy responses in countries around the world, as well as viewpoints and advice.
targetString: आर्थिक सहयोग और विकास संगठन ने विश्वभर के देशों में नीतिगत प्रतिक्रियाओं पर उचित समय पर और व्यापक जानकारी के साथ-साथ दृष्टिकोण और सलाह प्रदान करने के लिए एक मंच शुरू किया है।
en-mt: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development has launched a platform to provide perspectives and advice on timely and comprehensive information as well as perspectives on policy responses in countries around the world.

sourceString: From policies to strengthen health systems and the world economy to addressing the effects of lockdown and restrictions on travel, the digital hub includes a Country Policy Tracker, and aims to help countries learn from each other and to facilitate a co-ordinated global response to the coronavirus challenge.
targetString: नीतियों से लेकर स्वास्थ्य प्रणालियों को मजबूत करने तक और विश्व की अर्थव्यवस्था से लेकर यात्रा पर रोक और प्रतिबंध के प्रभावों को संबोधित करने तक, डिजिटल हब में एक कंट्री पॉलिसी ट्रैकर शामिल है, और इसका उद्देश्य देशों को एक दूसरे से सीखने और कोरोनावायरस चुनौती के प्रति एक समन्वित वैश्विक प्रतिक्रिया को सुविधाजनक बनाने में मदद करना है।
en-mt: From policies to strengthening health systems and from the world's economy to addressing the effects of stops and bans on travel, the digital hub includes a country policy tracker, and aims to help countries learn from each other and facilitate a coordinated global response to the coronavirus challenge.

sourceString: The Chinese government has been criticized by the United States, UK Minister for the Cabinet Office Michael Gove, and Brazil President Jair Bolsonaro's son Eduardo Bolsonaro for its handling of the pandemic, which began in the Chinese province of Hubei.
targetString: चीनी प्रांत हुबेई में शुरू होने वाली महामारी से निपटने के लिए चीनी सरकार की अमेरिका, कैबिनेट कार्यालय के लिए ब्रिटेन के मंत्री माइकल गोव, और ब्राजील के राष्ट्रपति जेयर बोल्सोनारो के बेटे एडुआर्डो बोल्सोनारो ने आलोचना की है।
en-mt: The Chinese government has been criticised by the US, UK Minister for Cabinet Office Michael Gove, and Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro's son Eduardo Bolsonaro for its handling of the pandemic that began in the Chinese province of Hubei.

sourceString: A number of provincial-level administrators of the Communist Party of China (CPC) were dismissed over their handling of the quarantine efforts in Central China, a sign of discontent with the political establishment's response to the outbreak in those regions.
targetString: चीन की कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी (CPC) के कई प्रांतीय स्तर के प्रशासकों को मध्य चीन में क्वारंटीन प्रयासों से निपटने के लिए बर्खास्त कर दिया गया था, जो उन क्षेत्रों में प्रकोप के प्रति राजनीतिक संस्था की प्रतिक्रिया से असंतोष का संकेत था।
en-mt: Several provincial-level administrators of the Communist Party of China (CPC) were sacked for dealing with quarantine efforts in central China, a sign of dissatisfaction with the political institution's response to the outbreak in those areas.

sourceString: Some commentators believe that this move was intended to protect Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping from the public's anger over the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: कुछ टिप्पणीकारों का मानना है कि इस कदम का उद्देश्य चीनी कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी के महासचिव शी जिनपिंग को कोरोनावायरस प्रकोप पर जनता के गुस्से से बचाना था।
en-mt: Some commentators believe the move was aimed at protecting Chinese Communist Party General Secretary Xi Jinping from public anger over the coronavirus outbreak.

sourceString: Some Chinese officials, e.g. Zhao Lijian rejected an earlier acknowledgement of the coronavirus outbreak starting in Wuhan, in favour of conspiracy theories about the COVID-19 originating from the U.S. or Italy.
targetString: कुछ चीनी अधिकारी, जैसे झाओ लिजियन ने वुहान में शुरू होने वाले कोरोनावायरस प्रकोप की एक पूर्व स्वीकार्यता को अस्वीकार कर दिया, जो कि अमेरिका या इटली से उत्पन्न होने वाले COVID-19 के बारे में षडयंत्रों के पक्ष में था।
en-mt: Some Chinese officials, such as Zhao Lijian, rejected a prior acknowledgement of the coronavirus outbreak that began in Wuhan, favoring conspiracies about COVID-19 originating from the US or Italy.

sourceString: The U.S. administration of Donald Trump has referred to the coronavirus as "Chinese virus" or "Wuhan virus" saying that China's "censorship supercharged a virus that has now turned into a global pandemic", which has in turn been criticized by some critics as racism and "distract[ing] from his administration's failure to contain the disease".
targetString: डोनाल्ड ट्रम्प के अमेरिकी प्रशासन ने कोरोनावायरस को "चीनी वायरस" या "वुहान वायरस" के रूप में संदर्भित किया है, यह कहते हुए कि चीन के "नियंत्रण व्यवस्था ने एक वायरस को अब वैश्विक महामारी में बदल दिया है", जिसे कुछ आलोचकों ने नस्लवाद और "रोग को रोकने में उनके प्रशासन की विफलता से भटकाने वाला" माना है।
en-mt: Donald Trump's US administration has referred to the coronavirus as the "Chinese virus" or "Wuhan virus", saying China's "control regime has turned a virus into a global pandemic now", which some critics have deemed racism and "a distraction from his administration's failure to contain the disease".

sourceString: The Daily Beast obtained a U.S. government cable outlining a communications stratagem with apparent origins in the National Security Council, with the strategy being quoted as "Everything is about China.
targetString: द डेली बीस्ट ने एक अमेरिकी सरकारी तार प्राप्त की, जो राष्ट्रीय सुरक्षा परिषद में स्पष्ट उत्पत्ति के साथ संचार मोरचाबंदी को रेखांकित करती है, जिसमें रणनीति के रूप में उद्धृत किया गया है कि "सब कुछ चीन के बारे में है।
en-mt: The Daily Beast obtained a U.S. government telegram outlining the communications frontalism with clear origins in the National Security Council, citing the strategy as "everything is about China."

sourceString: We're being told to try and get this messaging out in any way possible, including press conferences and television appearances."Outlets such as Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg have claimed that China's efforts to send aid to virus-stricken countries is part of a propaganda push for global influence.
targetString: हमें प्रेस कॉन्फ्रेंस और टेलीविज़न उपस्थिति सहित किसी भी तरह से इस संदेश को भेजने की कोशिश करने के लिए कहा जा रहा है। "पोलिटिको, फॉरेन पॉलिसी और ब्लूमबर्ग जैसे आउटलेट ने दावा किया है कि वायरस से ग्रस्त देशों को सहायता भेजने का चीन का प्रयास वैश्विक प्रभाव को बढ़ाने के लिए प्रचार का एक हिस्सा है।
en-mt: We are being asked to try to send this message in any way we can, including press conferences and television appearances. Outlets such as Politico, Foreign Policy and Bloomberg have claimed that China's attempt to send aid to countries hit by the virus is part of propaganda to increase global influence.

sourceString: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell warned that there is "a geo-political component including a struggle for influence through spinning and the 'politics of generosity'".
targetString: यूरोपीय संघ के विदेश नीति प्रमुख जोसेप बोरेल ने चेतावनी दी कि इसमें "भू-राजनीतिक घटक है जिसमें फेरबदल के माध्यम से प्रभाव के लिए संघर्ष और 'उदारता की राजनीति' शामिल है।"
en-mt: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell warned that it has a "geopolitical component that includes the struggle for influence through reshuffle and a 'politics of liberalism'." "

sourceString: Borrell also said that "China is aggressively pushing the message that, unlike the US, it is a responsible and reliable partner."
targetString: बोरेल ने यह भी कहा कि "चीन आक्रामक रूप से इस संदेश को आगे बढ़ा रहा है कि अमेरिका के विपरीत, यह एक जिम्मेदार और विश्वसनीय भागीदार है।"
en-mt: Borrell also said that "China is aggressively pushing the message that unlike the US, it is a responsible and reliable partner." "

sourceString: China has also called for the US to lift its sanctions off of Syria, Venezuela and Iran, while reportedly sending aid to the latter two countries.
targetString: चीन ने सीरिया, वेनेजुएला और ईरान से प्रतिबंध हटाने के लिए भी अमेरिका से आह्वान किया है, जिसमें बाद के दो देशों को कथित तौर पर सहायता भेजी गई है।
en-mt: China has also called on the US to lift sanctions on Syria, Venezuela and Iran, with aid reportedly sent to the latter two countries.

sourceString: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by US sanctions on 3 April.
targetString: क्यूबा के लिए जैक मा के 100,000 मास्क का दान 3 अप्रैल को अमेरिकी प्रतिबंधों द्वारा अवरुद्ध कर दिया गया था।
en-mt: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by U.S. sanctions on April 3.

sourceString: US authorities have also been accused of diverting aid meant for other nations to their own country.
targetString: अमेरिकी प्राधिकरणों पर भी अन्य राष्ट्रों के लिए आशयित सहायता को अपने देश के लिए परिवर्तित करने का आरोप लगाया गया है।
en-mt: U.S. authorities have also been accused of converting aid intended for other nations to their own country.

sourceString: And there have been mask-related disputes reported between other countries, such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland; and the Czech Republic and Italy.
targetString: और जर्मनी, ऑस्ट्रिया और स्विटजरलैंड; और चेक गणराज्य और इटली, जैसे अन्य देशों के बीच मास्क-संबंधी विवाद सामने आए हैं।
en-mt: and Germany, Austria and Switzerland; And mask-related disputes have emerged between other countries, such as the Czech Republic and Italy.

sourceString: In addition, Turkey seized hundreds of ventilators destined for Spain.
targetString: इसके अलावा, तुर्की ने स्पेन के लिए नियत सैकड़ों वेंटिलेटर जब्त किए हैं।
en-mt: In addition, Turkey has seized hundreds of ventilators destined for Spain.

sourceString: In early March, the Italian government criticized the European Union's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-affected Italy.
targetString: मार्च की शुरुआत में, इटली सरकार ने कोरोनावायरस प्रभावित इटली के साथ यूरोपीय संघ की एकजुटता की कमी की आलोचना की।
en-mt: In early March, the Italian government criticized the EU's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-hit Italy.

sourceString: Maurizio Massari, Italy's ambassador to the EU, said that "Only China responded bilaterally.
targetString: यूरोपीय संघ में इटली के राजदूत मौरिजियो मस्सारी ने कहा कि "केवल चीन ने द्विपक्षीय रूप से प्रतिक्रिया दी।
en-mt: Italy's ambassador to the EU, Maurizio Massari, said that "only China responded bilaterally."

sourceString: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European solidarity."
targetString: निश्चित रूप से, यह यूरोपीय एकजुटता का एक अच्छा संकेत नहीं है।"
en-mt: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European solidarity. "

sourceString: On 22 March, after a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian president Vladimir Putin arranged the Russian army to send military medics, special disinfection vehicles, and other medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: 22 मार्च को, इटली के प्रधानमंत्री जियूसेप कोंटे के साथ एक फोन कॉल के बाद, रूसी राष्ट्रपति व्लादिमीर पुतिन ने रूसी सेना को सैन्य चिकित्सक, विशेष कीटाणुशोधन वाहन और अन्य चिकित्सा उपकरण भेजने की व्यवस्था की।
en-mt: On March 22, following a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian President Vladimir Putin arranged to send military doctors, special disinfection vehicles and other medical equipment to the Russian military.

sourceString: Italy's La Stampa newspaper cited an anonymous "high-level political source" that 80 percent of Russia's aid was "useless or of little use to Italy".
targetString: इटली के ला स्टैम्पा समाचार पत्र ने एक नामरहित "उच्च-स्तरीय राजनीतिक स्रोत" का हवाला देते हुए कहा कि रूस की 80 प्रतिशत सहायता "बेकार या इटली के बहुत कम उपयोग की" थी।
en-mt: Italy's La Stampa newspaper, citing a nameless "high-level political source", said 80 percent of Russia's aid was "useless or of little use to Italy".

sourceString: The source accused Russia of embarking on a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.
targetString: इस स्रोत ने रूस पर "भू-राजनीतिक और राजनयिक" चापलूसी करने का आरोप लगाया।
en-mt: This source accused Russia of "geopolitical and diplomatic" flattery.

sourceString: The President of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.
targetString: लोम्बार्डी के अध्यक्ष एटिलियो फोंटाना और इटली के विदेश मंत्री लुइगी डि मियो ने मीडिया रिपोर्टों का खंडन किया और उनका आभार व्यक्त किया।
en-mt: Lombardy President Attilio Fontana and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio denied the media reports and expressed their gratitude.

sourceString: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the United States.
targetString: रूस ने अमेरिका को एक कार्गो विमान से चिकित्सा सहायता सामग्री भेजी।
en-mt: Russia sent medical aid supplies to the United States on a cargo plane.

sourceString: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when offering assistance to US colleagues, [Putin] assumes that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary."
targetString: क्रेमलिन के प्रवक्ता दिमित्री पेसकोव ने कहा कि "अमेरिकी सहयोगियों को सहायता की पेशकश करते हुए [पुतिन] यह मानते हैं कि जब चिकित्सा उपकरण और सामग्री के अमेरिकी निर्माता उत्पादन बढ़ा देंगे, तो वे आवश्यक होने पर प्रतिफल चुकाने में भी सक्षम होंगे।"
en-mt: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "while offering assistance to U.S. allies [Putin] recognizes that when U.S. manufacturers of medical equipment and materials increase production, they will also be able to repay reparations if necessary." "

sourceString: The planned NATO "Defender 2020" military exercise in Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states, the largest NATO war exercise since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a reduced scale.
targetString: जर्मनी, पोलैंड, और बाल्टिक राज्यों में शीत युद्ध की समाप्ति के बाद सबसे बड़ा NATO युद्ध अभ्यास, NATO "डिफेंडर 2020" सैन्य अभ्यास कम स्तर पर आयोजित किया जाएगा।
en-mt: The NATO "Defender 2020" military exercise, the largest NATO combat exercise since the end of the Cold War in Germany, Poland, and the Baltic States, will be held at a low level.

sourceString: The Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament's general secretary Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it jeopardizes the lives not only of the troops from the US and the many European countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating."The Iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with around two dozen parliament members infected as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.
targetString: परमाणु निरस्त्रीकरण के महासचिव केट हडसन ने डिफेंडर 2020 अभ्यास की आलोचना की: "वर्तमान सार्वजनिक-स्वास्थ्य संकट में, यह न केवल अमेरिका और कई यूरोपीय देशों के सैनिकों के जीवन को बल्कि इसमें भाग लेने वाले देशों के निवासियों को भी खतरे में डाल रहा है जहाँ वे काम कर रहे हैं।" ईरानी सरकार वायरस से बहुत प्रभावित हुई है, जिसमें लगभग दो दर्जन संसद के सदस्य संक्रमित हैं और साथ ही पंद्रह अन्य वर्तमान या पूर्व राजनीतिक लोग भी हैं।
en-mt: Secretary-General of Nuclear Disarmament Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it is endangering not only the lives of soldiers in the US and many European countries but also the residents of the participating countries where they are working. The Iranian government has been greatly affected by the virus, with about two dozen members of parliament infected as well as fifteen other current or former political people.

sourceString: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 March 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of the United States sanctions against Iran.The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
targetString: ईरान के राष्ट्रपति हसन रूहानी ने 14 मार्च 2020 को मदद मांगने के लिए विश्व नेताओं को एक सार्वजनिक पत्र लिखा, जिसमें कहा गया था कि उनका देश, ईरान के खिलाफ अमेरिका के प्रतिबंधों के परिणामस्वरूप अंतर्राष्ट्रीय बाजारों तक पहुँच नहीं होने के कारण प्रकोप से लड़ने में संघर्ष कर रहा है। इस प्रकोप ने अमेरिका को सार्वभौमिक स्वास्थ्य देखभाल, सार्वभौमिक बाल देखभाल, भुगतान प्राप्त परिवार की छुट्टी, और सार्वजनिक स्वास्थ्य के लिए उच्च स्तर के वित्तपोषण सहित अन्य धनी देशों में सामाजिक नीतियों को समान रूप से अपनाने के आह्वानों को प्रेरित किया है।
en-mt: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders seeking help on 14 March 2020, stating that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of US sanctions against Iran. The outbreak has prompted calls for the U.S. to equally adopt social policies in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and high levels of financing for public health.

sourceString: Political analysts anticipated it may negatively affect Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea worsened due to the pandemic.
targetString: राजनीतिक विश्लेषकों ने अनुमान लगाया कि यह 2020 के राष्ट्रपति चुनाव में डोनाल्ड ट्रम्प के फिर से चयन की संभावनाओं को नकारात्मक रूप से प्रभावित कर सकता है। जापान और दक्षिण कोरिया के बीच महामारी के कारण कूटनीतिक संबंध बिगड़ गए।
en-mt: Political analysts speculated that this could negatively affect Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election. Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea deteriorated due to the pandemic.

sourceString: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced anybody coming from South Korea will be placed in two weeks' quarantine at government-designated sites.
targetString: दक्षिण कोरिया द्वारा जापान के "अस्पष्ट और निष्क्रिय क्वारंटीन प्रयासों" की आलोचना की गई जब जापान ने घोषणा की कि दक्षिण कोरिया से आने वाले किसी भी व्यक्ति को सरकार द्वारा निर्दिष्ट स्थलों पर दो सप्ताह तक क्वारंटीन में रखा जाएगा।
en-mt: Japan's "vague and passive quarantine efforts" were criticised by South Korea when Japan announced that anyone arriving from South Korea would be quarantined for two weeks at government-designated sites.

sourceString: The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: दक्षिण कोरियाई समाज शुरू में संकट के प्रति राष्ट्रपति मून जे-इन की प्रतिक्रिया पर बँटा हुआ था।
en-mt: South Korean society was initially divided over President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.The pandemic has allowed countries to pass emergency legislation in response.
targetString: कई कोरियाई लोगों ने या तो सरकार द्वारा प्रकोप के दुष्प्रबंधन का दावा करते हुए मून के महाभियोग का आह्वान करने वाली याचिकाओं पर हस्ताक्षर किए, या उसकी प्रतिक्रिया की प्रशंसा की। इस महामारी ने देशों को प्रतिक्रिया में आपातकालीन कानून पारित करने को प्रेरित किया है।
en-mt: Many Koreans either signed petitions calling for Moon's impeachment, claiming the government's mismanagement of the outbreak, or praised its response. The pandemic has prompted countries to pass emergency laws in response.

sourceString: Some commentators have expressed concerns that it could allow governments to strengthen their grip on power.
targetString: कुछ टिप्पणीकारों ने चिंता व्यक्त की है कि यह सरकारों को सत्ता पर अपनी पकड़ मजबूत करने में मदद कर सकता है।
en-mt: Some commentators have expressed concern that it could help governments tighten their grip on power.

sourceString: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections and punish those deemed to have spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.
targetString: हंगरी में, इसकी संसद ने मतदान करके प्रधान मंत्री, विक्टर ओर्बन को अनिश्चित काल तक शासन करने की अनुमति दी, संसद के साथ-साथ चुनावों को निलंबित कर दिया और उन लोगों को दंडित किया जो वायरस और संकट से निपटने और सरकार के बारे में झूठी जानकारी फैलाते हुए पाए गए।
en-mt: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orban, to rule indefinitely, suspending parliament as well as elections and punishing those found to be spreading false information about the virus and the crisis and the government.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages, stemming from globally increased usage of equipment to fight the outbreaks, panic buying, and disruption to factory and logistic operations.
targetString: कोरोनावायरस के प्रकोप को आपूर्ति की कमी के कई उदाहरणों के लिए दोषी ठहराया गया है, जो वैश्विक स्तर पर प्रकोप से लड़ने के लिए उपकरणों के उपयोग से, डर से प्रेरित खरीदारी, और कारखाने और रसद कार्यों में व्यवधान से उत्पन्न हुई।
en-mt: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed on several instances of supply shortages, triggered by the use of equipment to fight the outbreak globally, fear-driven shopping, and disruptions to factory and logistics operations.

sourceString: The United States Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical equipment due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruption.
targetString: अमेरिकी खाद्य एवं औषधि प्रशासन ने बढ़ती उपभोक्ता मांग और आपूर्तिकर्ता व्यवधान के कारण दवाओं और चिकित्सा उपकरणों की कमी के बारे में चेतावनी जारी की है।
en-mt: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical devices due to rising consumer demand and supplier disruption.

sourceString: Several localities also witnessed panic buying that led to shelves being cleared of grocery essentials such as food, toilet paper, and bottled water, inducing supply shortages.
targetString: कई इलाकों में डर से प्रेरित खरीदारी की स्थिति भी देखी गई, जिसके कारण शेल्फों से भोजन, टॉयलेट पेपर, और बोतलबंद पानी जैसी किराने की जरूरी चीजों की कमी हो गई, जिससे आपूर्ति में कमी आई।
en-mt: Many localities also witnessed fear-driven shopping conditions, which led to shortages of grocery essentials like food, toilet paper, and bottled water off the shelves, leading to a shortage of supply.

sourceString: The technology industry in particular has been warning about delays to shipments of electronic goods.
targetString: विशेष रूप से प्रौद्योगिकी उद्योग को इलेक्ट्रॉनिक सामान के परिवहन में देरी के बारे में चेतावनी दी गई है।
en-mt: The technology industry in particular has been warned about delays in the transportation of electronic goods.

sourceString: According to WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom, the demand for personal protection equipment has risen 100-fold.
targetString: WHO के महानिदेशक टेड्रोस एदानोम के अनुसार, व्यक्तिगत सुरक्षा उपकरणों की मांग में 100 गुना वृद्धि हुई है।
en-mt: According to WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the demand for personal protective equipment has increased 100 times.

sourceString: This demand has led to the increase in prices of up to twenty times the normal price and also induced delays on the supply of medical items for four to six months.
targetString: इस मांग के कारण सामान्य मूल्य में बीस गुना तक की वृद्धि हुई है और साथ ही चार से छह महीनों तक चिकित्सा वस्तुओं की आपूर्ति में देरी हुई है।
en-mt: Due to this demand, the normal price has increased by twenty times and at the same time the supply of medical items has been delayed by four to six months.

sourceString: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the WHO warning that this will endanger health workers.
targetString: यह विश्वभर में व्यक्तिगत सुरक्षा उपकरणों की कमी का कारण बना है, जिससे WHO ने चेतावनी दी है कि यह स्वास्थ्य कर्मचारियों को खतरे में डालेगा।
en-mt: This has led to a shortage of personal protective equipment around the world, which the WHO warns will put health workers at risk.

sourceString: In Australia, the pandemic provided a new opportunity for daigou shoppers to sell Australian products into China.
targetString: ऑस्ट्रेलिया में, महामारी ने डाइगू दुकानदारों को चीन में ऑस्ट्रेलियाई उत्पादों को बेचने का एक नया अवसर प्रदान किया।
en-mt: In Australia, the pandemic provided Diegoo shoppers with a new opportunity to sell Australian products in China.
